title: [GAME] Elise is using her Human Form dialogue while in Spider Form
body: None of Elise's Spider Form lines are working at all. Something broke.

replies.body: Second this. Tried multiple times and with skins, that VO set is mia.

Hey Yousosmart! 

Thanks so much for the report. We'll see what's going on with her VO.

Yeah it's happening to everybody, 

- Her movement dialog
- Her Target dialog
- Her death cry
- Her taunts 

they all just use the human forme's sounds. Her abilities themselves are fine however.

Plz fix soon.
